product_name: Contadina Tomato Sauce, 29 oz (Pack of 6 Cans)
description: Contadina Tomato Sauce, 29 oz, Pack of 6 Cans contain the finest Roma tomatoes picked and packed at the peak of freshness. Contadina tomatoes are carefully packed and canned making them easy to store in your pantry and ready to create authentic Italian recipes in minutes. Contadina tomato paste is bursting with flavor, making them the perfect addition to any Italian staple like pizza, pastas, soups, sauces and more. When the Aiello brothers established Contadina in 1918, their goal was to produce canned tomatoes that matched the standard set in their native Italy. Over a hundred years later, we continue to maintain our founders' passion and commitment to quality by using fresh, vine-ripened Roma tomatoes that are grown and packed with care.
